mapper.select: SELECT s.`id`, s.`game_id`, s.`name`, s.`host`, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(s.`open_time`) AS `open_time`, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(s.`online_time`) AS `online_time`, s.`login_url`, IF(s.`gm_status` = 1, s.`gm_url`, NULL) AS `gm_url`, s.`status`, s.`gm_url`, s.`is_maintain`, s.`recommend`, s.`warning`, s.`min_version`, s.`max_version` FROM `game_server` s LEFT JOIN `game_channel_server` c ON c.`server_id` = s.`id` WHERE c.`channel_id` = #{channel_id} AND c.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY c.`position` DESC
